data.quote: The only people who never fail are those who never try.
data.author: Ilka Chase

data.quote: Failure is just another way to learn how to do something right.
data.author: Marian Wright Edelman

data.quote: I failed my way to success.
data.author: Thomas Edison

data.quote: Every failure brings with it the seed of an equivalent success.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever acheive greatly.
data.author: John F. Kennedy

data.quote: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken winged bird that cannot fly.
data.author: Langston Hughes

data.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
